title: Get started with experiences on Roblox
description: Learn how to create Roblox experiences with guides, tutorials, and code samples.
content:
Roblox is a 3D creation platform that provides an all-in-one IDE that includes
the Roblox Engine, a client emulator, and all the tools and APIs you need to
start creating Roblox experiences.






    Get Studio and take the tour
    Get acclimated with Studio by downloading and
    launching the onboarding tour.










    Create your first experience
    Create a simple 3D platformer while learning important Roblox building and scripting concepts.


      Create











    Learn about the platform
    Roblox is designed for mega-scale, 3D worlds. Learn about how it works!
    Overview
    For Unity Developers
    For Unreal Developers



Play and create with templates

Roblox Studio has a variety of templates that you can edit and play without prior
knowledge. Give them a try and add on to them when you're ready!






    Platformer
    Build your own 3D platformer with customizable platforms, coin pickups, and double-jump, dashing, rolling, and long jump character mechanics!


      Play











    Laser tag
    Build your own first-person shooter with customizable blasters, round systems, and modular building assets to reconfigure a high-quality arena!


      Play











    Racing
    Build your own kart racer with a customizable driving mechanics, checkpoints, and modular winding track pieces that you can restructure for countless courses!


      Play






Learn with curriculum paths

To dive deeper, follow along with guided curriculum
that teaches you the skills you need to create and monetize your experiences.






    Environmental art
    Environmental Art teaches you how to create a high-quality environment for a laser tag experience.


        Create











    Gameplay scripting
    Gameplay Scripting teaches you how to organize and implement the scripting logic for large, complex project.


        Create











    UI Design
    UI Design teaches you how to plan and implement UI components for unique user flows.


        Create






Connect
Learn, share, and interact with the Roblox community in the following places.




  On forums
  Staff announcements
  Staff articles
    Community tutorials
  Community help and feedback




  On social video channels
   YouTube channel
  Content and events platform
